citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00 am on
01/11/2016.
The facility has moved and your current license is no longer valid. I am providing an application packet that should
be filled out and sent to the Eastern Regional Office at the address below:
USDA, APHIS, Animal Care
920 Main Campus Drive, Suite 200
Raleigh, NC 27606.
No Regulated activity may be conducted until a valid USDA license is obtained.

narrative:

ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00 am on

The facility has moved and your current license is no longer valid.  I am providing an application packet that should
be filled out and sent to the Eastern Regional Office at the address below:

Raleigh, NC 27606. 
No Regulated activity may be conducted until a valid USDA license is obtained.
